personal.name: Tiles
personal.description: An auto expanding grid with identically sized squares that produces a tile explosion effect on click.

personal.name: Tiles 3D
personal.description: An auto expanding grid with identically sized cubes that raise up when hovered.

personal.name: Personal Site
personal.description: My personal resume site that showcases projects I have worked on and my skill set.

personal.name: FlipperZero Animation Tool
personal.description: An application for creating custom animations for the FlipperZero.

personal.name: Pikmin Party
personal.description: A web application that plays a Pikmin noise on a random interval.  It adds a small delight to get togethers.

personal.name: Trinity Force Network General Gaming Lootbox
personal.description: A site made to celebrate the 100th episode of TFN's General Gaming podcast. On the site you can unlock audio clips of the various news songs throughout its runtime.

personal.name: BUNNYWARNING's Personal Site
personal.description: Personal site for BUNNYWARNING.  Hosted on Neocities, this site was a complete re-write of his existing personal site to increase performance and allow for responsive design.
